name: Small Holiday Gift Basket
description:
Our small holiday gift basket contains:
A 32oz. Single Fin Sludge, an 8oz. Coconut Simple Syrup and Seaworth T-shirt, all handsomely packaged in a custom Seaworth galvanized tub stuffed with excelsior wood filler. Each basket comes complete with gift card.  Order yours today as these are sure to sell out! Tubs are made in USA.

*Please note that to limit the possibility of damage in shipment, the gift baskets are not fully assembled on receipt.  Each basket will need to be unpacked and arranged to look like the photo.

BEGINS SHIPPING DECEMBER 13.
LAST DAY FOR GUARANTEED DELIVERY BY DECEMBER 23rd OUTSIDE OF CALIFORNIA IS DECEMBER 13th.

name: Large Holiday Gift Basket
description:
Our large holiday gift basket contains:
A 32oz. Single Fin Sludge, an 8oz. Coconut Simple Syrup, a stainless shaker, glass mason Jar, wooden stirrer and T-shirt, all handsomely packaged in a custom Seaworth galvanized tub stuffed with excelsior wood filler. Each basket comes complete with gift card.  Order yours today as these are sure to sell out! Tubs are made in USA.

*Please note that to limit the possibility of damage in shipment, the gift baskets are not fully assembled on receipt.  Each basket will need to be unpacked and arranged to look like the photo.

BEGINS SHIPPING DECEMBER 13.
LAST DAY FOR GUARANTEED DELIVERY BY DECEMBER 23rd OUTSIDE OF CALIFORNIA IS DECEMBER 13th.

name: Seaworth Mason Jars
description:
We love mason jars.  Here's a nice set that you won't find anywhere else.  Quality 16oz. glass masons with our logo so you won't forget what kind of coffee you're drinking.  Rounded square profile that feels good in your hand.  Set of two including wooden stirring sticks.  *Shown here with corrugated chipboard inside for detail - jars are clear flint glass.

SHIPS BEGINNING DECEMBER 13.
LAST DAY FOR GUARANTEED DELIVERY BY DECEMBER 23rd OUTSIDE OF CALIFORNIA IS DECEMBER 13th.

name: 32oz. Growler
description:
32 beautiful ounces of our signature Single Fin Sludge cold brew concentrate, shipped straight to your door.  Makes approximately 8 drinks, depending on how you like it. Shake well before serving and keep refrigerated. Always brewed fresh and bottled cold.

Ships worldwide via USPS.

name: TWO-PACK 32oz. Growlers
description:
Two 32 ounce bottles of our signature Single Fin Sludge cold brew concentrate, shipped straight to your door.  Makes approximately 8 drinks each, depending on how you like it. Shake well before serving and keep refrigerated. Always brewed fresh and bottled cold.

Ships worldwide via USPS.

name: Organic Coconut Syrup
description: A must have if you prefer your coffee sweetened.  We craft our syrups by hand using only organic cane sugar and raw organic coconut.  The delicate coconut flavor is perfectly balanced and really brings out the chocolate notes in our cold brew.  We found that the 8 ounce size pairs perfectly with a 32oz. growler of cold brew.

name: 1lb. Fresh Roasted Whole Beans
description: Our customers asked, and we listened.  After many requests that we offer up our top-secret organic blend in whole beans (for the traditionalists out there), here it is.  1lb of fresh roasted goodness.  Oh that aroma!

name: Coffee Shaker
description: An essential item for any cold brew coffee drinker.  Why just stir your drink - when you can shake it!  We won't make a coffee cocktail without one.  High quality stainless steel with black Seaworth logo to remind you how much we love you.

name: Seaworth T-Shirt
description: This is considered formal attire in our office.  Super-soft, 100% cotton fine jersey. Short sleeve with water-base print.  Charcoal Heather with white logo on back and left chest. Pretty much awesome.  Mens sizes: S-2XL
